title: Cloud Atlas
director: Tom Tykwer, Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
writer: David Mitchell (novel), Lana Wachowski (written for the screen by), Tom Tykwer (written for the screen by), Lilly Wachowski (written for the screen by), Chris Lindsay (additional material)
actors: Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Jim Broadbent, Hugo Weaving
plot: Everything is connected: an 1849 diary of an ocean voyage across the Pacific; letters from a composer to his lover; a thriller about a conspiracy at a nuclear power plant; a farce about a publisher in a nursing home; a rebellious clone in futuristic Korea; and the tale of a tribe living on post-apocalyptic Hawaii far in the future.
country: Germany, USA, Hong Kong, Singapore, China
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 16 wins & 76 nominations.
name: Cloud Atlas
